name: Island Water Taxi Driver Sim
description:
Drive motor boats to take tourists to exotic locations on beautiful islands.

As a motor boat stunt driver, you can perform amazing stunts while you take tourists to various locations on the islands. These motor boats are speedy fast and tourists will like the stunts. Enjoy the ocean waves and realistic motions of your water boats.

If you like driving boats, or you are fan of boat simulators, then this is one of the coolest boat driving games with stunning visuals, and realistic physics.

Play it for FREE now!

Please leave us a feedback by rating us.
